name: Duck Hunter - bowmaster
description:
Duck Hunter - bowmaster is a simple action duck shooting game using bow and arrow. The goal of this hunting game is to shoot the ducks.
You have to kill at least 7 ducks to unlock next level.
If you miss a target duck or shoot a DUCK Bird which are endangered species you will lose 1 arrow and once you waste three arrows the game is over. Pull & release rope to shoot an arrow. The far you pull, powerful the shoot.

Features:
+ Duck Hunting With a Bow and Arrow.
+ Stunning graphics & sound effects.
